title: Update libwebp to 1.6.0
body:
## Summary

Update libwebp from v1.3.2 to v1.6.0 for security hardening and bug fixes.

## Changes

- Updated `externals/skia` submodule to mono/skia@b59a0308e1
- Updated `cgmanifest.json` with new libwebp version

## Highlights from v1.4.0 - v1.6.0

- Security hardening and increased fuzzing coverage
- Additional AVX2, SSE2 optimizations (AVX2 disabled for now, see #3464)
- Fix heap overflow in webpmux
- Lossless encoder improvements
- Various bug and warning fixes

## Related Issues

- Fixes #3465
- Fixes #3464

## Required skia PR

https://github.com/mono/skia/pull/163
